---
title: "Testing"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
source('gen_test_data.R')

dd <- gen.test.data(10, Measure = c("A","B","C"))

dd %>% pivot_wider(names_from = Outcome, values_from =Score) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = yes, y = no, color = Measure)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_grid(Diagnosis ~ Informant)
```
